pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a long, dark hallway with a polished, reflective floor. Doors line both sides of the corridor, and a bright light at the far end creates a strong silhouette and casts long shadows. The camera slowly pushes forward down the length of the hall.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
